Package mono.model.entities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • mono.model.entities.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bot

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a player and is reponsible for moving him, adding and removing money, managing is stay in jail, add properties, etc.
    Author:
    ricar

        name - player's name
        pieceType - player's piece
        bot - if the player is a bot or not

      • removeMoney

        public int removeMoney​(int value,
                       boolean obligatory)
        If possible, removes value from player
        Parameters:
        value - value to be removed
        obligatory - if the operation is obligatory or not (player is forced to pay rent, but not forced to buy properties)
        Returns:
        true if money was removed or false if player doesn't have enough money
